titles: Forasmuch as notwithstanding divers good Acts and Ordinances of Parliament made for the better observation of the Lords-day, days of publique humiliation, and thanksgiving, and the many endeavours used for the due execution thereof it is observed that the Lords day is very much prophaned, ...
author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.
Tichborne, Robert, Sir, d. 1682.
notes: Title from opening lines of text.
Dated at end: [handwritten] 12th day of [handwritten] Nouemb. 1656.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Sunday legislation --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
